txt.en: Talk to Firiondur inside the lighthouse at Aerthir
Firiondur can be found inside the lighthouse at Aerthir in southern-central Lebennin.\n\nYou have caught several pike and should now bring them to Firiondur.
Deliver the fish to Firiondur in Aerthir
'I shall get to work right away to prepare these fish for my folk.\n\n'You have done us a great service, my friend.'
'I shall get to work right away to prepare these fish for my folk.\n\n'You have done us a great service, my friend.'
Caught pike in the waters of Pelargir ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Refugees of Pelargir, like myself, have placed a great burden on our kinsmen. You see, in wartime we have all struggled to keep ourselves well-fed and... being pushed from Pelargir, we can no longer fish from its rich bounty.

'Pelargir is dangerous even now, my friend, but I bet a [placeholder] of your skill could reach the lower docks unharmed. If you could bring us even a few fish, it would help my fellows and I make it through another night.

'I cannot offer much in return, but I shall give what I can.'
The people of Lebennin have learned much about how to gather hearty fish from the rivers that carve through their lands.
Catch pike in the waters of Pelargir ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the fish to Firiondur in Aerthir
Pike can be found by fishing off the low docks in Pelargir.\n\nFiriondur has asked you to gather pike from the waters of Pelargir for the people displaced by the war.
